name: Havana Nights Outdoor Bar Plan – 8x5 Covered Patio Bar with Counter & Storage
open_features: (4) 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings supporting 6×6 SP No.2 posts
4 in slab-on-grade reinforced with 6×6 W4/W4 wire mesh
Stud walls: 2×6 SP No.2 @ 16 in O.C.
Bottom and top plates: (2) 2×6 SP No.2
Roof sheathing: 3/4 in OSB T&G panels
Counter constructed with polywood panels (1½ in thick) and 2×6 blocking
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z bases, H2.5A hurricane ties, SDS screws, galvanized bolts and washers
safety_note: Plans are for preliminary educational use only. Verify slab reinforcement, tie connections, and local code compliance with a licensed professional before construction.
